active.name: Shelter
active.description: Protects the group until a ship arrives to save them and from most weather.
active.effect: Kids only cost 1 Food per Night from now on.

active.name: Raft
active.description: If the group has completed this project, they may leave the island.
active.effect: If they have <20 food, they starve on the trip and everyone dies. If they have 20+ food they survive until a ship runs into them.

passive.name: Kids
passive.description: Feed smaller kids who canâ€™t help with most work.
passive.reward: Starter player gains either 1 food or resource (random) at End of Day.

passive.name: Fire
passive.description: Keep a fire lit to keep the group warm and cook food.
passive.reward: The previous starter player gains 1 food at the end of night.
